articles.author: Marcia Sekhose
articles.title: NASA’s Perseverance rover sets new record before hitting a one-year milestone on Mars - Business Insider India
articles.description: NASA’s Perseverance rover set a new record for the longest drive on a single solar day on Mars. Perseverance beat the 17-year-old record set by Opportunity.
articles.content:
NASA’s 
Perseverance rover will mark its first year anniversary on Mars next week but before that, it has already achieved a new milestone in its journey so far. Perseverance has set the record for … [+1863 chars]
